scripts.build:analyze: npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist/stats.html
scripts.health-check: curl -f http://localhost:5173 || echo 'Dev server not running'
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=austinmovefinder --env=staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=austinmovefinder
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'E2E tests placeholder for Austin Move Finder'
scripts.austin:dev: echo 'Starting Austin Move Finder development server...' && npm run dev
scripts.austin:build: echo 'Building Austin Move Finder for production...' && npm run build:production
